reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Dr. Thompson makes complex concepts easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. Highly recommend his classes.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes hard to follow. Office hours were helpful.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of classic works. Prof. Williams encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Outstanding teacher! Dr. Lee's lab experiments are both educational and fun.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dry lectures and excessive reading assignments. Could improve presentation style.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Martinez relates theories to real-world scenarios effectively.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations but moves through material quickly. Extra practice problems would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and well-structured course. Dr. Brown is an inspiring educator.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex economic concepts. Prof. Anderson uses relevant, current examples.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Dr. Patel organizes great field trips and hands-on projects.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Interesting course content overall.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Garcia is always willing to help students understand difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems biased in presentations. Could improve by offering more balanced viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with innovative teaching methods. Dr. Nguyen makes language study exciting.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Stimulating debates and well-structured arguments. Prof. Harris challenges students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course material but unclear grading criteria. Dr. Clark could improve communication.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Excellent real-world insights. Prof. White's industry experience greatly enhances the course.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Fascinating field trips and lab work. Dr. Moore's enthusiasm for rocks is contagious.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable instructor but fast-paced classes. More practice exercises would be beneficial.
